labels.label:
1) Use Random Keys over Sequential Keys
In GenerateFlowFlow Change in Text field "nextInt()" to "UUID" Change in schema.name from sampleSequential to sampleRandom
2) Use a LoadBalancer
In PutDatabaseRecord - DBConnectionPool - Change the connection URL to point to a LoadBalancer instead of a node
3) Add threads to PutDatabaseRecord and other processors Have PutDatabaseRecord use 5 threads Have ConvertRecord use 3 threads
4) Create Batches Add MergeRecord processor to batch up inserts

outputPorts.name: fail
outputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'fail'' is invalid because Output connection for port 'fail' is not defined.

entry.value: create table if not exists sample (id string, payload string, primary key (id));
